Online Pizza Order Software Online Restaurant Reservations and Online Order System
FoodCourt Software sets the standard for future online restaurant reservation and food order systems. Based upon the powerful and robust IMSCart reservations software engine, the system was designed to provide utmost flexibility for the restaurant owner.
When you purchase our FoodCourt Software you are paying a one-time license fee. There are no monthly fees, no commissions or any other ongoing maintenance fees. The price includes installation on the server or hosting plan of your choice and we provide one hour of telephone consultation to get you started.
If you have an existing web site and a basic knowledge of html and css, you can modify the look and feel of FoodCourt and integrate it into your existing web site, or if you prefer, we can do it for you for a small additional fee.

Typical Applications:
Single Fast Food Restaurant
Mom and pop or single unit, pizza restaurants wanting to expand their business by providing an online pizza order system now have the opportunity to obtain a professional and robust solution without breaking the bank. The FoodCourt Software package costs less than most providers charge to set up a monthly subscription.
Major benefits of the FoodCourt system include:
Low cost, robust and scaleable solution with no monthly fees or other ongoing costs. Templates can be changed by anyone with html and css experience for integration into existing an web site. Or, for as low as $300, we will modify the templates for you. Can be installed on your server or ours. Powerful product options allow your customers to build a pizza or other food product from scratch based upon your list of ingredients. Pizza template allows your customers to build half and half pizzas, adding and subtracting ingredients from one side or the other, or from the whole pizza. Powerful cross-sell feature will increase order size by offering drinks, appetizers, or other products you select. Food can be marked for pick-up or delivery. System recognizes when the store is closed and will accept orders for a future time or date. Online orders can be delivered by email and/or Fax and are available for online viewing. (Fax delivery may require subscription to email to Fax service). Minimum order restriction Options to provide automatic or manual order confirmation. Compatible with most credit card gateways. Integrated coupon software Powerful, integrated newsletter software to send special offers to all or selected customers. Integrated contact software Integrated affiliates software Integrated reports Full email and telephone support available Developed in Canada and supported from the USA
Multiple Outlet or Restaurant Pizza or Fast Food Delivery Chain
With the ability to handle multiple stores with different tax rates, and unique admin login accounts for store managers and staff, the FoodCourt system is ideal for owners of restaurants with multiple outlets.
In addition to the above, FoodCourt provides the following features for owners of restaurants with multiple outlets:
The software can easily be upgraded to incorporate a powerful"store select"feature.
Each store can have different opening hours and accept orders for a future time and date. System maintenance package available.
Dine-in Restaurant
FoodCourt provides dine-in restaurant owners the ability to substantially increase their revenues and improve efficiency by allowing their dine-in or pick-up service customers the ability to pre-order and pay for their their food online.
For those wishing to provide the ultimate experience, FoodCourt integrates seamlessly with our mapping module, which can provide your customers with a graphical view of your restaurant layout, allowing them to preselect a table and pay for their food and drinks prior to their arrival.
And, for restaurants attached to an hotel, other modules provide the ability to reserve a room and order a limo and even a tour.
The FoodCourt system is a powerful, flexible, and low-cost solution for online pizza order software , owners of franchise and multiple restaurants, dine-in restaurants, and grocery store owners wishing to increase their revenue by offering an easy to use online ordering system for their facility.
